name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a result-oriented Senior Support Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in problem-solving and troubleshooting within diverse environments, including **Windows**, **Linux**, and **Unix** systems. My technical proficiency includes scripting in **Python** and managing **REST** APIs, which complements my strong foundational knowledge in networking concepts such as **FibreChannel** and **IP**. I am adept at leveraging my communication skills to engage with customers effectively, ensuring clarity and satisfaction in resolving technical issues.
Beyond support roles, I have a solid background in full stack development, utilizing modern tech stacks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have experience integrating machine learning capabilities into production environments and implementing cloud solutions using **Azure** and **AWS**, showcasing my ability to adapt to ever-evolving technological challenges. My organizational and planning skills enhance my capacity to deliver robust solutions aligned with compliance standards, ideally merging technical expertise with a customer-focused mindset.
